page.title: 14Farming 8 - Great House Farm
page.content: The farmer of Great House owns 2 other adjoining properties. They are North Farm and Ton Farm, and all three together account for 650 acres of land, much of which stretches to the other side of Llanvapley. We were surprised top hear that he only sows 50 acres of potatoes because while we drove along the road it seemed that the potato fields stretched as far as the eye could see. In one of the farmer's huge barns stood a massive grain silo capable of holding 90 tons of grain. He used 120 acres of his land to grow grain crops. The farmer's son did not work for his father but owned 3 fish and chip shops and one bakery. So the farmer sold most of his grain and potatoes to his son.
